name: Nirmal Scaria

top_projects.name: le-git-graph
top_projects.description: Browser extension to add git graph to GitHub website.

top_projects.name: label_marker
top_projects.description: Flutter plug in for map markers with text labels

not-a-boring-board.summary: Recent activities on the not-a-boring-board repository have been focused on introducing various features and resolving existing issues, including enhancements such as sorting arrays, grouping items, implementing an eraser tool, and adding a conditional toolbar. Several fixes were also applied to address problems like making text interactive, migrating to fabric text, and ensuring array items are properly selectable. These updates demonstrate significant development efforts to improve the repository's functionality.

le-git-graph.summary: The le-git-graph repository has seen recent updates focused on enhancing documentation, specifically concerning Fine-Grained token minimal permissions for restricted access. This includes the documentation of Fine-Grained token minimal permissions and improvements to general security. These changes highlight efforts to improve security and reduce potential vulnerabilities in the repository.

profile_summary:
Nirmal Scaria is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong background in programming languages such as C, TypeScript, and Python. As a seasoned designer, developer, and pentester, he possesses a unique blend of technical expertise and creative vision, enabling him to deliver innovative solutions that meet the most demanding requirements. With a professional network of 84 followers and a portfolio of 35 public repositories, Nirmal has established himself as a reputable and reliable figure in the development community, consistently demonstrating his ability to produce high-quality code and collaborate effectively with others.

As a multifaceted developer with a passion for design, development, and security testing, Nirmal brings a distinctive perspective to his work, combining technical proficiency with a deep understanding of user needs and industry trends. His expertise in languages like C, TypeScript, and Python has equipped him to tackle complex projects with confidence, and his experience as a pentester has given him a keen eye for identifying vulnerabilities and improving system security. With his extensive experience and dedication to his craft, Nirmal Scaria is a valuable asset to any development team, bringing a high level of technical expertise, creativity, and professionalism to every project he undertakes.
